Comments comments
```{r}
x <- sum(1:10)
```
Do something with x
```{r}
x + 5
```
How about something else with x
```{r}
mean(c(x, 10, 20, 30))
```

```{r}
cool <- function(x) {
  print(x + " is a good number")
}
```

do something
```{r}
cool(5)
```
